description:
This is my take on the Ringwraith or Nazg√ªl from Tolkiens lore, The Lord of The Rings. The crafting tutorial shows you how to create a cheap miniature of this creature, using only extremely cheap materials and simple techniques. This miniature works well for Dungeons & Dragons or LotR SBG. Subscribe!: https://tinyurl.com/y2qxwefo

title: LotR - Crafting a Nazgul / Ringwraith Miniature (Custom Miniature Crafting Tutorial)
